cleaned_text: Centre for Virus and Vaccine Research Overview The Centre for Virus and Vaccine Research focuses primarily on research into pathogenic viruses and the development of vaccines and antivirals against these viruses. As part of the School of Science and Technology, we work together with academics from the school in advancing biomedical science research. Our research is supported by research grants from the Ministry of Science, Technology and Innovation (MOSTI), and the Fundamental Research Grant Scheme (FRGS) from the Malaysian Ministry of Higher Education. One of our postgraduate candidates recently won a MOSTI-administered Dr Ranjeet Bhagwan Singh Medical Research Trust Fund for her research. Vision To become recognised internationally as a centre of excellence for fundamental and applied biomedical science research Mission To facilitate and be a focus for Sunway University's research endeavours in fundamental and applied biomedical science research
